pkgmetadata.longdescription: # color-hash**Generate a color based on a value**This module generates a color based on an object, by calculating a color valuebased on a hash value for the object. This means the result is deterministic:the same value will always result in the same color (so long as the hashfunction remains deterministic).This module is a port of the [color-hash Javascript library](https://github.com/zenozeng/color-hash).It supports Python 3.7+ and it has no dependencies.## Quick Start```python>>> from colorhash import ColorHash>>> c = ColorHash('Hello World')>>> c.hsl(131, 0.65, 0.5)>>> c.rgb(45, 210, 75)>>> c.hex'#2dd24b'```## InstallationIts hosted on PyPI.```bashpip install colorhash```## Changelog- color-hash **1.3.1** *(2023-09-21)* - üêõ Handle missing `importlib-metadata` import- color-hash **1.3.0** *(2023-09-20)* - üßëüíª Add `py.typed` to support type annotations (#4) - üì¶ Changed packaging ecosystem - ‚ûñ Remove `poetry` - ‚ûñ Remove `tox` - ‚ûï Add `pip-tools` (manage dependencies) - ‚ûï Add `hatch` (build & test) - ‚ûï Add `twine` (publish) - ‚ú® Support `python3.11` - ‚ö∞Ô∏è Drop support for `python3.6`- color-hash **1.2.2** *(2022-10-17)* - ‚ú® Add publish helper script- color-hash **1.2.1** *(2022-10-17)* - üìù Update docs- color-hash **1.2.0** *(2022-10-17)* - üßëüíª Use typing supporting `python3.6`- color-hash **1.1.0** *(2022-09-01)* - ‚úÖ Add tests - üö∏ Add installation instructions- color-hash **1.0.4** *(2021-11-30)* - Support only for `python3.6+` - ‚úÖ Add tests- color-hash **1.0.3** *(2020-12-04)* - ‚ö∞Ô∏è Drop support for `python2.x` - üéâ Handover of project maintenance- color-hash **1.0.2** *(2016-07-08)* - ‚ú® Add ``crc32_hash`` function and set default hashfunc to that.
